title: font identification
content:
Does anyone know what this font is or a font that is close to it. Please let me know. Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [PADRE FONT.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828214200/http:/typophile.com/files/PADRE%20FONT.jpg) | 78.65 KB |
author: MELANIE 5184

comments.content:
Most probably a custom work as almost all MLB team logos.  
Freely available as vector [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828214200/http:/www.brandsoftheworld.com/logo/san-diego-padres).  
Alternatives: fonts tagged " [baseball](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828214200/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/baseball)" at MF, many [LHFs](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828214200/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/) (Ballpark, Tideway, Chicago, Red Sable, Ephemera)
